issue.title: [C++] Add index pages to the format to support efficient page skipping
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3124](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3124). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
we should add the features implemented in [PARQUET-922](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PARQUET-922) to parquet-cpp
